MainPage.AboutSectionText: - is a non-profit organization whose goal and mission is to restore Ukraine and strengthen its statehood. To contribute to the victory of the Ukrainian people and to provide effective, high-quality and, most importantly, comfortable conditions for every person.
MainPage.AboutSectionText2: of the charitable organization is, first of all, psychosocial support and cultural and educational activities for everyone who feels the need and is interested in it.

MissionPage.Title: Mission and Statute
MissionPage.SubTitle: Fond
MissionPage.SubTitle2: – is about the future. Happy, comfortable and fair.
MissionPage.Text3: — is a dynamic non-profit organisation committed to rebuilding Ukraine and strengthening its statehood.
MissionPage.Text5: to achieve victory and create comfortable conditions for everyone. Our main activities are focused on psychosocial support and cultural and educational work, and are open to everyone who needs it.
MissionPage.Text7: , victims of hostilities and those in need of social adaptation, with a particular focus on students and young people, as we believe that psychological support is crucial for the future of the country.
MissionPage.Text10: , promoting health, self-development and self-realisation through social media and public speaking. The Foundation creates platforms for networking, actively invests in the country's victory by organising fundraisers, donations and volunteering to help the state in all necessary areas.
